title: Local official product logos as static assets (no remote URLs at runtime)

requirements.summary: Replace all product images with official online-sourced logos stored locally under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced via /assets/generated/* paths.
acceptanceCriteria: For each product in `frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx` (Netflix Premium, Chess.com Diamond Membership, Spotify, YouTube Premium, ChatGPT, Gemini, Facebook, Toffee, Chorki, Deepto Pay, Bioscope, iScreen, Hoichoi, PUBG Mobile, Free Fire, Adobe Creative, Canva, Truecaller, CamScanner), there is a corresponding official logo/image file present under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
All product `image` values in `frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx` reference local paths beginning with `/assets/generated/` and do not use any remote URLs.
The app builds successfully and product cards render logos without broken image icons; if an image fails to load, the existing letter-placeholder fallback still appears (no UI regression).

file_operations.description: Add official Netflix logo sourced online as a static asset at this exact path and filename (512x512).
Add official Chess.com logo sourced online as a static asset at this exact path and filename (512x512).
Add official Spotify logo sourced online as a static asset at this exact path and filename (512x512).
Add official YouTube Premium logo sourced online as a static asset at this exact path and filename (512x512).

Add official CamScanner logo sourced online as a static asset at this exact path and filename (512x512).

Update every product's `image` field (Netflix Premium, Chess.com Diamond Membership, Spotify, YouTube Premium, ChatGPT, Gemini, Facebook, Toffee, Chorki, Deepto Pay, Bioscope, iScreen, Hoichoi, PUBG Mobile, Free Fire, Adobe Creative, Canva, Truecaller, CamScanner) to reference only the new local static asset paths beginning with `/assets/generated/` and matching these exact filenames: `/assets/generated/netflix-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/chesscom-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/spotify-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/youtube-premium-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/chatgpt-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/gemini-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/facebook-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/toffee-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/chorki-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/deepto-pay-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/bioscope-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/iscreen-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/hoichoi-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/pubg-mobile-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/free-fire-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/adobe-creative-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/canva-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/truecaller-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/camscanner-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`. Preserve all other product fields and storefront behavior (search filtering, cart, WhatsApp flows, priced vs unpriced). Ensure no remote/external image URLs are introduced.
